text: Joachim Bäse (2 September 1939 – 22 December 2020) was a German football player. He was born in Braunschweig. He played ten seasons in the Bundesliga with Eintracht Braunschweig. He also played for Germany once in 1968. Bäse died on 22 December 2020, aged 81.Eintracht Braunschweig trauert um Achim Bäse ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2020 deaths Category:German footballers Category:People from Braunschweig
title: Joachim Bäse
